INSERT INTO TB_CHAL_WORD /*테이블_챌린지_단어*/ ( CHAL_SEQ /*챌린지일련번호*/ , WORDBOOK_SEQ /*단어장일련번호*/ , WORD_ID /*단어식별자*/ , FST_REG_ID /*최초등록자ID*/ , LT_UPD_ID /*최종수정자ID*/ ) SELECT #{chalSeq} /*챌린지일련번호*/ , T1.WORDBOOK_SEQ /*단어장일련번호*/ , T1.WORD_ID /*단어식별자*/ , #{loginInfo.userId} /*최초등록자ID*/ , #{loginInfo.userId} /*최종수정자ID*/ FROM TB_WORD T1 /*단어*/ WHERE T1.WORDBOOK_SEQ IN (${wordbookSeqArr}) ORDER BY CORRECT_CNT ASC LIMIT ${chalCnt}
